title: How's League's new client in linux/wine?
body:
I haven't played league for awhile,
and I heard league got new client,

so is it playable under wine?

replies.body: We don't currently provide support for Linux, meaning I don't know for certain how it will perform you.  We wouldn't be able to assist if you experienced any issues with this.  We do have a [recent article](http://engineering.riotgames.com/news/architecture-league-client-update) about the architecture on the new client that provides some information on how the client is being built.  Hopefully this sheds some light towards what you're looking for!
How many virgins do I have to sacrifice to get a Linux-compatible client?
Forget it RIOT don't need Linux players to earn millions dollars so they will never do this.

The new beta client don't work anymore, while it was nearly perfect with the old one. 
I will have to go play Dota2 that provide a real Linux support.
